name: Quotes Random
author: Quotes8

sections.description:
This plugins shows random Quotes from famous topics like inspirational quotes, motivational quotes, life quotes, love quotes from famous Authors.

It can be used as a widget, so it’s easy to install.

You can also use the shortcode [quotes-random] to show random quotes to your post or page.

Source quotes is from Quotes8

Features

  • Widget allows you to place Random Quotes sidebar on your page
  • Shortcode allows you to place Random Quotes on your post or page body content.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload quotes-random folder to your wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Add widget to your prefered location through the ‘Appearance’ menu in WordPress.
  4. or Add shortcode [quotes-random] to show Random Quotes to your post or page.

short_description: This plugins shows Random Famous Quotes to your website Widget, Post or Page with Shortcode.
